text: I failed at my attempt but afterwards these are some words that helped meI failed   days ago  but that s okay  Parts of me which I didn t fail  but I reached out and theses are some words that help me stabilize a bit  I hope some of you read this and it helps as well Your absence will leave a void similar to yours but mine will always remain because you re not there  Your absence will throw my entire life off course It s your duty to bury your parents not the other way around  If I had to bury my child  I will be devastated  There would be no words or actions I could do to mend that wound If you done all you can  then you can at least live on  for others  and hopefully one day you can live for you You don t want us to find out by your mom telling us you re no longer with us I ll be punching the air because there s no one to blame but myself It ll make me wonder is there more I could have done the last time we were together Two days ago  I was at my end  I was no longer willing to move towards the future  but I reached out  I m not strong enough to do this alone  and I took a step to attempt to get better  I m not a quitter and I m damn well not going to cut this attempt at life short I m not sure what everyone is facing  but let me face it with you

text: Tried telling a friend about my thoughts on Sunday  he promptly talked about his exI feel stuck  I had attempted suicide in middle school and got stopped on the day of  I used HP to get out of my depression  but it seems that that Harry Potter phase has been dying out for me since I have my Bachelor s already  I have what seems an unreachable future   wanted to be a doctor  but don t have the GPA for it  nor have I done sufficient volunteer hours  haven t even attempted the MCAT  Talk of suicide in my family always leads them to call it stupid  My friend  the one mentioned here  talked about it when he had broken up with his ex and I was there for him  Now  the way he answered was by pretty much saying he is talking to his ex  and he found out two of his friends attempted suicide  It seems he doesn t reciprocate now that I needed him  I tried talking about it with my other friends but they seem to have problems of their own  I just feel like there isn t really a place for me  Everyone is slowly forgetting our friendship and I was always trying to be the one to piece it back together  I was always the one trying to figure out what they like  but no one in over   years has asked me what I am into or what I like  and slowly I have become so numb  angry at times  and empty  I keep telling myself that I m just being overdramatic that others have it worse  It hasn t pushed the thoughts out though  Ended up deleting social media  because all I get are reminders from FB when I was happy and it just hurts  knowing that the source of my happiness is gone it s funny no one noticed

text: Close to losing my sonI posted in suicide bereavement asking for advice on my son  who had an attempt earlier in Sept  Someone suggested this sub  so here I am  My   year old son wants to kill himself  Point blank  He does not want to be here anymore  He has deep depression and his meds are not touching it  That is  if he is really taking them  I have my doubts  After getting out of hospital  he promised  he would call me before ever letting things go that far again  I do not believe that either  He just wanted to tell me what I wanted to hear  He confessed  that he has tried about   hardcore attempts  including hanging himself with a belt from a transom  which he broke and had to pay to get fixed  hanging by necktie and   od s  This last OD was by far the worst  He was found unresponsive and barely survived  He looked so disappointed when he woke up in icu tethered to the bed and ventilated  He does not want to be alive and I just can not figure out how to help  I guess I am silently shouting for help by coming online looking for answers  He is alive and I selfishly want to keep him alive  It is gut wrenching thinking about losing him  I am so scared for him  If I don t hear from him every couple of hours I think the worst and freak out  I read that words like  think about your family  are not encouraged in responses here  but if you are suicidal and think that taking your own life will only effect yourself  No

text: Read if suicidalI just want to say before you read on that I overdosed a couple of days ago and I am waiting for liver failure to kick in but the waiting period has given me time to reflect and while I have done this I don t recommend suicide of any kind to anyone for this reason Suicide is a selfish act  I don t mean you or I are selfish people but from my experiences and the experiences of people I have spoke with when they have attempted it is usually spur of the moment you just need to do it  That is all you think about  Doing it  Ending it However while I have been waiting to die I am remembering things I will miss  like hanging out with friends and family  work  etc  I will also never get to see lucifer s  or move to london or become the richest person who ever lived  ik big dreams and unrealistic It also reminds me that when the liver failure kicks in I will need to let my family and friends know what I have done  I will have to go through countless painful conversations and watch everyone I love in tears about something I cannot stop I know I have used I here a lot  maybe I am selfish idk but my point is that if you are thinking about suicide and think no one can or will help  try to help yourself  Picture your family and friends hearing the news  Research the method in which you want to attempt and read the horror stories of people who survives  Imagine the pain your death will inflict on others and it may stop you inflicting pain onto yourself   Please seek help  Good luck
summary: I overdosed a couple of days ago and I am waiting for liver failure to kick in. I don't recommend suicide of any kind to anyone. Suicide is a selfish act. If you are thinking about suicide and think no one can or will help you, try to help yourself.
cleaned: overdose couple day ago wait liver failure kick not recommend suicide kind suicide selfish act think suicide think no help try help

text: The thing I ve wanted most for the longest time is to die  I ve wanted this since I was a young child at around age  I given myself so many chances  Every time I get suicidal I tell myself just push through  I try my best not to involve others and just focus on what needs to be done  I never do it correctly I always fail  Now I m stuck in a situation where the doctors can t help my leg pain and I m stuck with crutches and I can t keep a constant job  I m an international person I grew up with friends from all over the world studying in a school in Asia  Recently my best friend got married and I went to his wedding in Russia which he had to buy me tickets for because I m too broke  I saw how all our friends have lived girlfriends relationships and I was deviated how I wasn t able to secure any of that for myself  I m happy for them but I want a small piece for myself and I m just not able to secure anything   I m disabled I have polio and I m super depressed and girls just get turned off by me  It s been   years since I ve had any sex or touch or anything like that  I m really over this life  I hope everyone enjoys what this world has to offer because I certainly dont  I m giving myself one last chance with this new job I m trying to land  If I don t score a girlfriend and make some friends and get out of this situation I m going to end my useless pathetic suffering life  Fuck you god

text: Suicidal pact between my fiance and I  Our love is like no other I ve ever truly believed existed  However we both struggle with and depression and feel we have failed as parents due to no stable income and have no place or hope to contribute to society My fiance and I have both made a suicide pact  We both have children  our ex s have custody of my finances daughter  my ex has  physical  custody of my son as we have never gone to court to make arrangements  We love our children SO deeply  girl    boy  and although we are fully aware of how selfish it would be to leave them in a world where no other mother or father will EVER love them as much as We do we do feel they will not only be taken great care of as our ex s despite their flaws  we know our children are in good safe hands  Not to mention they have tons of othervloving family members who will always be deeply involved   The thing is  There is still hope    last hope  I need to get a full time job  This could be the start of the hope we have been waiting for to start a new beginning  We have both been seeking professional help and ssri s for depression  I just had to get this off my chest  However with this hope comes a major struggle  I lost my expired license  and NEED documents to get a job  my birth certificate and my ss card   That s my best at an attempt at making our lives work  If it doesn t work we decided how we will carry out our act and when the date we have set as out limit  Forgive long post and typos and further confusion

text: My parents are causing my suicidal thoughtsBeen suicidal for almost   years  I ve been cutting myself for over   Just recently told my parents about how I was suicidal and I ve been cutting myself  They told me that I should stop acting and be a man  They told me I was cutting myself because I was  trying to get attention  when my top priority was to not let anyone know  That s why I kept it a secret for so long  I just don t know what to do anymore  I feel suicidal everyday  but I don t really have a plan or thought on when and how I will end my life  I just want the pain the end  To be happy again  One of the main reasons why I m suicidal is because of my parents  They ve been abusive to me for almost my whole life  Hitting  kicking  screaming at me  My parents argue and drink almost every night  Then my mom blames everything on me  Saying that it s my fault that she is arguing with my dad WHEN MOST OF THE TIME I WASN T IN OR PART OF THE CONVERSATION  Sometimes my friends can hear my parents argue  They ask if I m okay and if they should call somebody  I told my parents to quiet down so that nobody asks anything  Then my mom started saying that if they call the police or anybody  it would be my fault  Then she started taking it out on me  Telling me that I m a failure and that I am an embarrassment because I was suicidal  For all my life my mom told me that if I tell anybody what my parents do to me  then I would be taken away and sent to a new home  When I was younger I was scared of that thought and I didn t want to leave my parents  But now that I m older I feel like it would be better to get away from them  Anyway  if you read till this point then I hope you understand what s going on  I didn t want to make a huge ass paragraph so I only wrote a little bit
summary: Been suicidal for almost years and has been cutting himself to get attention. His parents have been abusive to him for almost his whole life. They argue and drink almost every night. His mom blames everything on him. He doesn't know how to get away from them.

text: I ve made peace with dying my apologies if this is scattered  its been on my mind for awhile well  i guess for some background information im   and i started my first year of highschool not too long ago   needless to say  im ready to give up  ive pushed away everyone who cared  my grades are falling  and i no longer have it in me  for a very long time ive always had thoughts of suicide  but ive always been able to ignore them  but that isn t the case anymore  everytime i wake up  i hear a loud voice that constantly tells me to kill myself  everyone hates me  and i would be better off dead  and i guess when i really put things into perspective  that voice is right  i don t do much of anything now  my days are spent under blankets in complete isolation unless my mom or my cat walks into my room  i dont feel anything  i dont draw like i used to  my sketchbooks and old paintings laugh at me  its almost ironic  art used to be a major escape for me during middle school  and now I can t do it anymore  im pretty much useless at this point  but dying would be so much better for me  if i died  I wouldn t have to suffer anymore  i could finally be happy  nothing is really stopping me from finally killing myself  I already have a set date  time  and method  im ready to die

text: reached the lowest low yesterday  tw yesterday i was just so tired  i want nothing out of life and i feel like a burden to my family  i came home from work and took a knife to my throat and tried to slit it  the knife was wayyy too dull and obviously human instinct kicks in so i didn t end up going deep enough amp  gave up  it wasn t even my planned way to go  it was such a weird impulsive moment  i cleaned it up  pretended it didn t happen  and went to my friend s house  he kept asking me why i was hiding my neck and i completely broke down and couldn t stop sobbing  i told him what i did and he s the only one that knows  i don t want anyone to know because i don t want to get told to go to a mental hospital since i have classes next week  i m aware i need some mental help but i feel like im fine as of now  anyways  life is weird  this entire summer i kept begging the universe to let me just see a monarch butterfly up close  and today  august  st  the last day of  summer  i saw a monarch and almost held it  i know this is something small  but it was like a sign  if i actually killed myself i wouldn t have gotten to see what i wanted to see this entire summer  if you re reading this  have some patience with life  theres little surprises everywhere

text: Anyone have friends a little too political  My group of friends saw an article on how some dude installed an electric fence and kids got shocked by it when they were trespassing  My take was  well  if he d tried getting kids off his lawn before and they don t listen  then yeah you can take measures to keep them from trespassing  My very PC friend was pretty offended by that and called me a  capitalist anarchist  It kinda put me on the defensive  and it made me look like an asshole for wanting kids to get  electrocuted  We later read the article and the guy was just an asshole  put the fence by a bus stop without warning  but still rubbed me the wrong way that I was associated with a pretty extreme and dare I say crazy political group over something like this
summary: Some dude installed an electric fence and kids got shocked by it when they were trespassing on his lawn. His PC friend called him a capitalist anarchist for wanting kids to get electrocuted. He later read the article and the guy put the fence by a bus stop without warning.
cleaned: dude instal electric fence kid got shock trespass lawn pc friend call capitalist anarchist want kid electrocute later read article guy fence bus stop warn
